column1: Subject: Labour, Employment, Wages and Productivity
Topic: Wages and Income from Employment
Table Title: Average Weekly Paid Hours Worked Per Employee By Industry, Annual

1) Before 2006, data pertain to private sector establishments each with at least 25 employees.  From 2006 onwards, it includes the public sector.  2) Annual figures are the simple averages of the figures obtained at quarterly intervals.  3) Data are classified according to the Singapore Standard Industrial Classification (SSIC) 1996 (1990-1999), SSIC 2005 (2000-2005), SSIC 2020 (2006-current).
Includes Agriculture, Fishing, Quarrying, Utilities and Sewage & Waste Management.
na   not available or not applicable
-     nil or negligible or not significant
Numbers may not add up to the totals due to rounding.
Data are the latest available at the time of access or download. Some statistics, particularly those for the most recent time periods, are provisional and may be subject to revision at a later date.
Values are shown in Singapore dollars (unless otherwise specified).
